law.catch_line: Powers and duties of officers in positions created under KRS 16.187.
law.text:
The powers and duties of officers in the positions established by KRS 16.187 shall be as follows:
Commercial vehicle enforcement officers and commercial vehicle enforcement officers R class shall enforce:
Commercial vehicle licensure, operator, traffic, and criminal violations;
Motor vehicle operator, traffic, and criminal law violations on a highway; and
All the laws and administrative regulations of the Commonwealth at the direction of the commissioner;
Arson investigator officers shall enforce:
All criminal laws pertaining to arson; and
All the laws and administrative regulations of the Commonwealth at the direction of the commissioner;
Hazardous devices investigator officers shall enforce:
All criminal laws pertaining to hazardous devices; and
All the laws and administrative regulations of the Commonwealth at the direction of the commissioner; and
Facilities security officers shall have the jurisdiction and duties established pursuant to KRS 61.900 to 61.930.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2009.
